caption:
“Light speaks softly to the soul.”

Reflection:
In gentle radiance, truth descends. Illumination is not shouted — it arrives as grace.

Commentary:
This line teaches that enlightenment is tender. God’s wisdom enters quietly, transforming without force, brightening the heart’s hidden corners.
